skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I craft responsive and interactive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, and React. My focus is on building pixel-perfect designs that are optimized for performance and deliver an exceptional user experience across all devices.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I develop robust and scalable backend systems using Laravel and the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js). From database architecture to API integrations, I ensure secure and efficient server-side operations for modern web applications.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I design clean, intuitive, and user-friendly interfaces that prioritize usability and user engagement. My design approach combines aesthetics with functionality to deliver seamless digital experiences.

skills.title: WordPress Development
skills.description: I create custom WordPress websites and themes that are fully responsive, SEO-friendly, and easy to manage. Whether you need a personal blog, business site, or e-commerce store, I build solutions that align with your goals.

portfolio.title: Real Estate Property Listing Website for UAE (Laravel)
portfolio.description: A full-featured real estate website built using Laravel, tailored for the UAE property market. It enables users to explore properties for rent and sale, filter by city (Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, etc.), price, type (villa, apartment, commercial), and contact agents.

portfolio.title: Laravel-Based Financial Tracking & Vehicle Management System
portfolio.description: A custom Laravel-based financial and vehicle management system for HR Motors. It tracks car purchases from Japan, multi-stage shipments, payments (cash, cheque, online), sales to customers, and miscellaneous expenses. Features include an AdminLTE dashboard, invoice generation, and role-based user access.

portfolio.title: Modern MERN-Based E-Commerce Platform
portfolio.description: A scalable, secure, and fully-featured e-commerce website built with Mern. It allows users to browse products, add to cart, checkout securely, and manage orders. The admin dashboard enables product, category, and order management. The application supports discount coupons, dynamic pricing, product search, and responsive design for all devices.
